title:
The Hausdorff dimension of planar elliptic measures via quasiconformal
  mappings
abstract:
In this paper we study the dimension of planar elliptic measures via the
application of quasiconformal mappings. In fact, in our case studies, we find a
quasiconformal mapping that relates the elliptic measure in a domain to the
harmonic measure in its image domain, and we deduce bounds for the Hausdorff
dimension of the elliptic measure by the known results on the harmonic side.
